channel.title: Autoing Safely
channel.description:
Is it safe to auto without a proxy/tor/ip masker? I have a router, so I dont think an ip masker will help any. Also, when I use tor, rs tends to lag pretty badly. Any ideas/reccomendations? I just dont want to get my main banned...
:cool:

item.title: Autoing Safely
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

yeah, i proxy though, I got a static ip. Its laggy though, but it works. =)

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing Safely

ohh i see, thanks tons

++

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing Safely
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

They rarely group ban, they have to have pretty strong evidence of macroing for each ban they make. And for UID, I’m not sure what it stands for, but if I were to make a guess, I’d say Unique ID. Its just a unique line of numbers or something that the RuneScape client saves to your Internet files so they can somewhat track you, but I believe if you use an unsigned applet, they can’t send a UID, so I recommend using that applet type.

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing Safely
item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

Ahhh thanks, and look out, theres a new mining pure out there somewhere in rs[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 06:57:16 PM[/size][hr]@frank… UID? Sorry, but whats that?

also…say im caught macroing on one account…will all my accounts be banned? or will i just get that one account banned?

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing Safely
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You can auto “legitly”, where as say you make a new account from scratch and auto on 1 object for no more than 2-3 hours then play legit every now and then.

The good thing with that, to jagex it looks like a new pure, account.

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing Safely
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

the only reason you would ever need a proxy is if you have a static IP, or if you want to run a ton of accounts at once.

even if you did have a static IP, it probably wont matter, its usually the UID that will catch you out

Read full topic

Tor Park is good. Proxy way to slow. Ip masket never tried.
